name: FreezeFrame
author: Eric van Fandenfart
description:
Creates a Freeze Frame locally of all avatars in a world by creating a copy of each avatar. The avatar is in the state the Freeze Frame was activated. Freeze Frames can be stacked and all Freeze Frames can be deleted afterward.
The buttons to create an delete Freeze Frames are found in the action menu and on the player quick menu

 With [VRCWS](https://github.com/Er1807/VRCWS) the event of taking a freeze is synchronized between all members in the lobby that also have VRCWS and FreezeFrame and are connected to the same VRCWS server
changelog:
Recording now saves also Blendshapes and enabled/disabled objects. Disolve and in generel shader params are not supported
Added delete first option and a delete mode
Restructured the menu and it now has icons
